name: Grave Robber (StruckDumb)
description:
This is Grave Robber! Follow our hero Kevin as we descend down an endless grave fighting the ghosts below and avoiding rocks! 

Use your arrow keys to move across the screen, and use Z and X keys to either shrink or grow.  Grow big to crash through the rocks, and shrink down to kill the ghosts! 

Get as many points as possible by traveling further and hitting targets. Make sure to get combo points for all your hits!

Fullscreen recommended.
